meanings.sent1: She wore an unironed shirt to the casual party.
meanings.sent2: The unironed clothes looked wrinkled and messy.
meanings.sent3: He realized his mistake when he showed up in the unironed outfit to the formal event.
meanings.sent4: The unironed fabric clung awkwardly to her body.
meanings.sent5: The unironed garments hung limply on the hanger.

meanings.definition: Not smoothed with a hot iron
meanings.sent1: The unironed dress had creases that wouldn't go away.
meanings.sent2: She decided to wear the unironed pants since she was running late.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his unironed shirt was the latest fashion trend.
meanings.sent4: Her unironed hair stood out in a sea of perfectly styled locks.
meanings.sent5: The unironed curtains fluttered in the breeze, revealing their wrinkles.

meanings.definition: Not pressed with a flat iron
meanings.sent1: The unironed tablecloth had visible folds and creases.
meanings.sent2: She avoided wearing the unironed skirt to the important meeting.
meanings.sent3: He tried to pass off the unironed napkins as intentional rustic decor.
meanings.sent4: The unironed sheets felt rough against her skin.
meanings.sent5: The unironed fabric retained the shape of its packaging.
